name: Food Court Hamburger Cooking
description:
NEW RESTAURANTS AVAILABLE NOW!

Need a little more heat in your kitchen? A little more charm in your cooking? Then this is the game for you! "Food Court Hamburger Cooking," the latest and greatest game in the “Food Court Fever” series, has proved itself to be one of the toughest, funniest, and just all around greatest time management and restaurant simulation games on the App Store. Download this FREE TO PLAY game now and find out why!

No other cooking game has the fast and furious action of “Food Court Hamburger Cooking.” This exciting NEW adventure takes you to exotic restaurants all across a funky downtown city, upgrading your kitchens as you try to keep your crazy customers happy and well-fed! Do you have what it takes to become a Master Chef? Download now and find out!

Features:
■ Offline or online, NO internet connection required!
■ Free to play FOREVER, no purchase required!
■ TAPPING gameplay, NO dragging here!
■ Serve a cast of cute and crazy characters!
■ Cook food from around the WORLD!
■ UPGRADE your kitchen until it’s perfect!
■ 2018’s FASTEST new cooking game!
■ HUNDREDS of challenging levels!
■ If your time management skills are good enough, you’ll conquer this restaurant simulation and become a true MASTER CHEF!

Download "Food Court Hamburger Cooking" NOW! This is the latest and greatest game from the creators of “Kitchen Craze” and “Cooking Country,” games enjoyed by MILLIONS of players. Come to find out why when you download this awesome free to play the game!

Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/Flowmotionentertainment
